logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Extending the put.java of the webdav usecase. You can now add any file via PUT. Still there is a problem how lenya stores the final file. It uses the xml extension for all files. I tried with PUT a png and in will be saved like {name}/index_{lang}.xml. I can open it with Gimp but Lenya will fail to open the document complaining about 'Invalid byte 1 of 1-byte UTF-8 sequence.'
